Text: maybe eat food that other people make or stew things (english is not my 1st language but bolognese and that kinda stuff) where itâ€™s harder to estimate kcals?

Author: ParticularlyPigeon
Text: Is it possible you could try new foods that you don't know the calorie counts of and make sure that you don't check the nutritional info? It's a temporary solution, but it might help until you've recovered more and are in a better place.
